sub_title: Health Policy Research Associate at the London School of Economics | Assistant Professor at Maastricht University
summary:
Areas of interest
1) Supporting the development of health systems and policies to allow the sustainable integration of digital healthcare services;
2) Advancing the digital health competence within the mental healthcare sector so digital healthcare can be deployed and used efficiently by professionals and patients.

About me
I am an enthusiastic and motivated young professional that attempts to solve problems at hand in a creative and collaborative way. Empathy, communication and social skills combined with determination, perseverance, and an eye for detail help me achieve my goals. I am naturally ambitious, curious, and keen to learn, which ties in with my innate ability to internalise large amounts of knowledge rapidly. I enjoy working in teams and seek to assemble the strongest and most versatile team for the task at hand.

profile_positions.description:
- Conceptualise and develop policy recommendations for digital health implementation and reimbursement in WHO/Europe
- Present recommendations at WHO/Europe’s digital health event
- Develop a policy brief based on the recommendations
profile_positions.title: Consultant

company.name: The London School of Economics and Political Science (LSE)

profile_positions.company: The London School of Economics and Political Science (LSE)
profile_positions.description:
Research
- Co-supervision of PhD students
- Write research proposals for grant applications
- Perform research projects in various health fields (e.g. digital health, vaccine policy, mental health)
- Create and develop LSE Health Digital, the dedicated digital health research hub within LSE Health

Project Management 
- Identify and create a funding network
- Lead on proposal submissions including methodological sections, team composition and budget preparation.  
- Prepare new project management processes in line with innovative approaches
- Organise project plans for health-related projects 
- Draft stakeholder engagement plans for specific project opportunities
- Provide research support to project activity
